articles.title: House of the Dragon's Fabien Frankel didn't want sex scene with Milly Alcock to be 'gratuitous' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The actor, 28, plays Kingsguard Ser Criston Cole in the Game Of Thrones prequel and his character shares an intimate moment with Princess Rhaenyra Targaryen (Milly Alcock).
articles.content:
